question:
Which of the following countries are members of Asia-Pacific Space Cooperation Organization (APSCO)?
  1. Bangladesh
  2. India
  3. China
  4. Iran
Select the correct option from codes given below:
explanation: Asia-Pacific Space Cooperation Organization (APSCO) is an inter-governmental organization operated as a non-profit independent body. It aims to promote and strengthen the development of collaborative space programs among its Member States. Its member states are: Bangladesh, China, Iran, Mongolia, Pakistan, Peru and Thailand.
